data.description: Amazon Comprehend is a natural language processing (NLP) service that uses machine learning to find insights and relationships in text. The service does the following for you: Identifies the language of the text. Extracts key phrases, places, people, brands, or locations. Understands how positive or negative the text is. data.title: Multi-Step LSTM Time Series Forecasting Models for Power Usage
data.description: Given the rise of smart electricity meters and the wide adoption of electricity generation technology like solar panels, there is a wealth of electricity usage data available. data.title: Shopper Sentiment: Analyzing in-store customer experience
